requirement:
1. AS1和AS3各有一个环回（192.168.1.0/24、192.168.2.0/24），不能在任何协议中直接宣告，要求最终可以互ping。
2. AS2内部IP划分为172.16.0.0/16，内部使用OSPF。
3. AS间骨干链路IP可自行设定。
4. 全网通过BGP使所有设备环回互通。
5. 减少路由条目数量并避免环路。
steps: 1. 配置各设备IP地址和环回接口IP。
2. 在AS2内部配置OSPF，实现内部互通。
3. 配置BGP建邻关系，确保AS之间路由可达。
4. 宣告各自设备需要发布的环回地址。
5. 配置路由反射器以优化iBGP邻居关系。
6. 宣告其他子网的详细路由条目。
7. 配置静态黑洞路由，减少路由条目，防止路由环路。
8. 建立GRE隧道实现AS1与AS3不可直通网段的互通（192.168.1.0/24与192.168.2.0/24）。

configs.R1:
# 
sysname R1
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/0
 ip address 12.1.1.1 255.255.255.0
interface LoopBack0
 ip address 172.16.0.1 255.255.255.255
interface LoopBack1
 ip address 192.168.1.1 255.255.255.0
bgp 1
 router-id 172.16.0.1
 peer 12.1.1.2 as-number 2
 network 172.16.0.1 32
interface Tunnel0/0/0
 ip address 10.1.1.1 255.255.255.0
 tunnel-protocol gre
 source 172.16.0.1
 destination 172.16.0.8
ip route-static 192.168.2.0 255.255.255.0 10.1.1.2
#
return
configs.R2:
# 
sysname R2
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/0
 ip address 12.1.1.2 255.255.255.0
interface LoopBack0
 ip address 172.16.0.2 255.255.255.255
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/1
 ip address 172.16.1.1 255.255.255.252
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/2
 ip address 172.16.1.21 255.255.255.252
ospf 1 router-id 172.16.0.2
 area 0.0.0.0
  network 172.16.0.0 0.0.255.255
bgp 64512
 router-id 172.16.0.2
 peer 12.1.1.1 as-number 1
 peer 172.16.0.3 as-number 64512
 peer 172.16.0.5 as-number 64513
 peer 172.16.0.3 connect-interface LoopBack0
 peer 172.16.0.5 connect-interface LoopBack0
 peer 172.16.0.3 next-hop-local
 peer 172.16.0.5 next-hop-local
 peer 172.16.0.5 ebgp-max-hop 255
#
return
configs.R3:
# 
sysname R3
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/0
 ip address 172.16.1.2 255.255.255.252
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/1
 ip address 172.16.1.5 255.255.255.252
interface LoopBack0
 ip address 172.16.0.3 255.255.255.255
interface LoopBack1
 ip address 172.16.3.3 255.255.255.0
ospf 1 router-id 172.16.0.3
 area 0.0.0.0
  network 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255
bgp 64512
 router-id 172.16.0.3
 peer 172.16.0.2 as-number 64512
 peer 172.16.0.4 as-number 64512
 peer 172.16.0.2 connect-interface LoopBack0
 peer 172.16.0.4 connect-interface LoopBack0
 peer 172.16.0.2 next-hop-local
 peer 172.16.0.4 next-hop-local
 peer 172.16.0.4 reflector-client
 network 172.16.3.3 255.255.255.0
ip route-static 172.16.0.0 255.255.0.0 NULL0
#
return
configs.R4:
# 
sysname R4
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/0
 ip address 172.16.1.6 255.255.255.252
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/1
 ip address 172.16.1.9 255.255.255.252
interface LoopBack0
 ip address 172.16.0.4 255.255.255.255
interface LoopBack1
 ip address 172.16.4.4 255.255.255.255
ospf 1 router-id 172.16.0.4
 area 0.0.0.0
  network 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255
bgp 64512
 router-id 172.16.0.4
 peer 172.16.0.3 as-number 64512
 peer 172.16.0.7 as-number 64513
 peer 172.16.0.3 connect-interface LoopBack0
 peer 172.16.0.7 connect-interface LoopBack0
 peer 172.16.0.3 next-hop-local
 peer 172.16.0.7 next-hop-local
 peer 172.16.0.7 ebgp-max-hop 255
 network 172.16.4.4 255.255.255.0
ip route-static 172.16.0.0 255.255.0.0 NULL0
#
return
configs.R5:
# 
sysname R5
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/0
 ip address 172.16.1.22 255.255.255.252
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/1
 ip address 172.16.1.17 255.255.255.252
interface LoopBack0
 ip address 172.16.0.5 255.255.255.255
interface LoopBack1
 ip address 172.16.5.5 255.255.255.0
ospf 1 router-id 172.16.0.5
 area 0.0.0.0
  network 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255
bgp 64513
 router-id 172.16.0.5
 peer 172.16.0.6 as-number 64513
 peer 172.16.0.2 as-number 64512
 peer 172.16.0.6 connect-interface LoopBack0
 peer 172.16.0.2 connect-interface LoopBack0
 peer 172.16.0.6 next-hop-local
 peer 172.16.0.2 next-hop-local
 peer 172.16.0.2 ebgp-max-hop 255
 network 172.16.5.5 255.255.255.0
ip route-static 172.16.0.0 255.255.0.0 NULL0
#
return
configs.R6:
# 
sysname R6
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/0
 ip address 172.16.1.18 255.255.255.252
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/1
 ip address 172.16.1.13 255.255.255.252
interface LoopBack0
 ip address 172.16.0.6 255.255.255.255
interface LoopBack1
 ip address 172.16.6.6 255.255.255.0
ospf 1 router-id 172.16.0.6
 area 0.0.0.0
  network 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255
bgp 64513
 router-id 172.16.0.6
 peer 172.16.0.5 as-number 64513
 peer 172.16.0.7 as-number 64513
 peer 172.16.0.5 connect-interface LoopBack0
 peer 172.16.0.7 connect-interface LoopBack0
 peer 172.16.0.5 next-hop-local
 peer 172.16.0.7 next-hop-local
 peer 172.16.0.5 reflector-client
 network 172.16.6.6 255.255.255.0
ip route-static 172.16.0.0 255.255.0.0 NULL0
#
return
configs.R7:
# 
sysname R7
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/0
 ip address 172.16.1.14 255.255.255.252
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/1
 ip address 172.16.1.10 255.255.255.252
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/2
 ip address 34.1.1.7 255.255.255.0
interface LoopBack0
 ip address 172.16.0.7 255.255.255.255
interface LoopBack1
 ip address 172.16.7.7 255.255.255.0
ospf 1 router-id 172.16.0.7
 area 0.0.0.0
  network 172.16.0.0 0.0.255.255
bgp 64513
 router-id 172.16.0.7
 peer 172.16.0.6 as-number 64513
 peer 34.1.1.8 as-number 3
 peer 172.16.0.4 as-number 64512
 peer 172.16.0.6 connect-interface LoopBack0
 peer 172.16.0.4 connect-interface LoopBack0
 peer 172.16.0.6 next-hop-local
 peer 172.16.0.4 next-hop-local
 peer 172.16.0.4 ebgp-max-hop 255
 network 172.16.7.7 255.255.255.0
ip route-static 172.16.0.0 255.255.0.0 NULL0
#
return
configs.R8:
# 
sysname R8
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/0
 ip address 34.1.1.8 255.255.255.0
interface LoopBack0
 ip address 172.16.0.8 255.255.255.255
interface LoopBack1
 ip address 192.168.2.8 255.255.255.0
interface Tunnel0/0/0
 ip address 10.1.1.2 255.255.255.0
 tunnel-protocol gre
 source 172.16.0.8
 destination 172.16.0.1
bgp 3
 router-id 172.16.0.8
 peer 34.1.1.7 as-number 2
 network 172.16.0.8 32
ip route-static 192.168.1.0 255.255.255.0 10.1.1.1
#
return
